short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Count and highlight keywords in the current webpage.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Visible Word Counter is an intuitive and powerful Chrome extension designed to help users, content creators, SEO specialists, and educators instantly calculate the total number of words visible on any webpage. This tool is especially useful for optimizing content readability and ensuring that text visibility aligns with SEO practices and user engagement metrics.
